comwave.description: SaaS for scheduling & auto-publishing content across social platforms.
comwave.longDescription: Multi-tenant architecture with organization management, roles and permissions. OAuth 2.0 authentication system for each social platform. Scheduled publishing pipeline with async queues (BullMQ).
comwave.title: ComWave

egenr.description: Cross-platform desktop application for podiatrists and healthcare professionals.
egenr.longDescription: Patient record management with standardized medical forms. Automatic generation of professional PDF reports. Secure local storage, GDPR compliant.
egenr.title: EgenR

quoiRegarder.description: Web platform to discover, organize and track movies and series.
quoiRegarder.longDescription: Advanced search engine with precise filters. Personalized lists and progress tracking. Recommendation system based on user preferences.
